email_chain.subject: Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Sarah,

We are looking to ship 50,000MT of coal from Newcastle to Shanghai in November. Could you provide a freight rate and vessel availability for this shipment?

Best regards,
John Doe

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

Thank you for your inquiry. We can offer the vessel MV OCEAN BREEZE for this shipment. The laycan is 15-20 November, and the freight rate is $25/MT on a CFR basis. Please let us know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Sarah Lee

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Sarah,

Thank you for the offer. The rate seems a bit high compared to the current market. Could you consider lowering it to $22/MT?

Best regards,
John Doe

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

We can adjust the rate to $23/MT, which is our best offer at the moment. Please confirm if this is acceptable so we can proceed with the booking.

Best regards,
Sarah Lee

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Sarah,

We agree to the rate of $23/MT. Please proceed with the booking and send us the recap.

Best regards,
John Doe

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

Thank you for your confirmation. We will proceed with the booking and send you the recap shortly.

Best regards,
Sarah Lee
